Arithimetic Operators.discription: The Arithimetic Operators Program In Python
Arithimetic Operators.code:
// This program will print the sum of two numbers.
num1 = int(input("Enter the first number: "))
num2 = int(input("Enter the second number: "))
sum = num1 + num2
print("The sum of " + str(num1) + " and " + str(num2) + " is " + str(sum))
